content.question: Jamestown, the first permanent English settlement in the New World, was founded by

choices.label: three aristocratic proprietors seeking private gain
a joint stock company anxious to return a profit to investors
Sir Walter Raleigh, wishing to gain favor with Elizabeth I
King James I, eager to gain a base for expeditions against Spanish shipping
John Smith, seeking to spread Christianity

content.answer: a joint stock company anxious to return a profit to investors

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
